item.title: (Insta)gram the dam
item.description: A portrait of Amsterdam Urban Beaches this is a draft insert images, videos and interactive dashboard If you are curious to know what an architect and a linguist do when they work together, I invite you to read this article by Tom van Arman who presents the urban design tool we have imagined.
